title: Platforms realize they don’t need journalists
description: Tech companies will double down on improving the quality of information they provide in 2026, but that investment won’t help publishers find a path to stability. The good news is that tech companies will face pressure in the year ahead to bolster the information ecosystem. As competition heats up between OpenAI, Google, Anthropic and other...
